content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Juventus 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Juventus 2.
Attempt blocked. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Substitution, Juventus. Alessandro Matri replaces Mirko Vucinic.
Foul by Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus).
John Obi Mikel (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Mauricio Isla.
Attempt blocked. Mirko Vucinic (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Claudio Marchisio.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Mirko Vucinic (Juventus) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Mirko Vucinic (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Claudio Marchisio.
Foul by John Terry (Chelsea).
Mirko Vucinic (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Juventus 2. Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Claudio Marchisio with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Juan Mata (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Substitution, Juventus. Mauricio Isla replaces Stephan Lichtsteiner.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
